SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.HIT,A.USER_NO, A.STATE, A.MAX_USER, A.LOCAL_NO, A.IP, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.JOIN_START, A.JOIN_END,A.ID, A.NICKNAME, A.GENDER, A.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO, A.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, A.FILESYSTEM FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LOCAL_BOARD_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.CREATE_DATE, F.HIT, F.USER_NO , F.STATE, F.MAX_USER, F.LOCAL_NO, F.IP, F.MODIFY_DATE, F.JOIN_START, F.JOIN_END,U.ID, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER, TN.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO, TN.FILESYSTEM FROM LOCALS F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCALS_IMAGE TN ON F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO = TN.LOCAL_BOARD_NO) A
LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}

SELECT A.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.CREATE_DATE, A.HIT,A.USER_NO, A.STATE, A.MAX_USER, A.LOCAL_NO, A.IP, A.MODIFY_DATE, A.JOIN_START, A.JOIN_END,A.ID, A.NICKNAME, A.GENDER, A.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO, A.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, A.FILESYSTEM FROM (SELECT F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.CREATE_DATE, F.HIT, F.USER_NO , F.STATE, F.MAX_USER, F.LOCAL_NO, F.IP, F.MODIFY_DATE, F.JOIN_START, F.JOIN_END,U.ID, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER, TN.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO, TN.FILESYSTEM FROM LOCALS F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCALS_IMAGE TN ON F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO = TN.LOCAL_BOARD_NO) A WHERE A.FILESYSTEM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LOCAL_BOARD_NO DESC limit 0, 3;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCALS (TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, HIT, USER_NO, STATE , MAX_USER, LOCAL_NO, IP, MODIFY_DATE , JOIN_START, JOIN_END ) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, #{userNo}, 0, #{maxUser}, #{localNo}, #{ip}, NOW(), #{joinStart}, #{joinEnd} )
mapper.select: SELECT F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO, F.TITLE, F.CONTENT, F.CREATE_DATE, F.HIT, F.USER_NO , F.STATE,F.MAX_USER, F.LOCAL_NO, F.IP, F.MODIFY_DATE,F.JOIN_START, F.JOIN_END, U.ID, U.NICKNAME, U.GENDER FROM LOCALS F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE F.LOCAL_BOARD_NO = ${localBoardNo}
SELECT F.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO, F.FILESYSTEM, U.LOCAL_BOARD_NO FROM LOCALS_IMAGE F INNER JOIN USERS U ON F.LOCAL_IMAGE_NO = U.USERS WHERE LOCAL_BOARD_NO = #{localBoardNo}
